details.description: The bulky pendant ligand was synthesized in two steps as the Na salt (mcc-HexCS2Na).

synthesis_conditions.step: Synthesis of divalent and trivalent Pt dimer complexes

details.description: Divalent and trivalent Pt dimer complexes based on the ligand, PtII2(mcc-HexCS2)4 and PtIII2(mcc-HexCS2)4I2, were synthesized respectively.
The reaction of equimolar amounts of PtII2(mcc-HexCS2)4 and PtIII2(mcc-HexCS2)4I2 in o-Xylene offered black cube-like single crystals of the target MMX-chain, 1.
